publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3434# Mr Adam Ingram: In-Service Teacher Training - Child Psychology-That the Parliament recognises the value of comprehensive in-service training for teachers in identifying social, emotional, behavioural and learning difficulties which can have a significant impact on a child's development if not detected and referred for treatment at an early stage and notes that the current provision and levels of training are not sufficient in addressing this issue.

S1M-3434# Mr Adam Ingram: In-Service Teacher Training - Child Psychology—That the Parliament recognises the value of comprehensive in-service training for teachers in identifying social, emotional, behavioural and learning difficulties which can have a significant impact on a child’s development if not detected and referred for treatment at an early stage and notes that the current provision and levels of training are not sufficient in addressing this issue.
